docblock.description:
1. go to page 2. enter name and location 3. creatge page 4. allow edits (move marker on map, edit details)
MEMBERSHIP Each page needs to be confirmed with an email click. Before this is done, the page "ShowInSearch" + ShowInMenus = false Each person creates an account, if they are not logged in yet. If they try to create an account with an existing email then they are asked to log in.
LOCATION It is possible to go to this page with preset variables (e.g. they did a search and there is nothing there...) You can only come from this page from the "future" parent page.
